pages.title: Inscription
pages.text: Take item in your hand, and say:$(br)'Mana shape inscribe, shape area ignite!'

pages.title: Adjustment
pages.text: Then, say:$(br)'Mana shape adjust, add condition hit.'

pages.title: Description
pages.text: This is very simple Enchantment, which sets entities in some area around caster on fire.$(br)You can add 'duration 10' to make targets be on fire for 10 seconds.
